name: Ethereal Night
description: An entry for the Brackeys Game Jam 2021.1. A very difficult co-op platformer, complete parkour with the help of your teammate's light. This is a keyboard only game, read the controls page first. If you run into any bugs that cause your player to get stuck, the G key will reset Player 1 to the last respawn point and the H key will do the same for Player 2.
